# daily.dev

> Where developers grow together - the professional network for developers to learn, collaborate, and grow together.

## Root URL
https://app.daily.dev

## Overview

daily.dev is a professional network serving 1M+ developers worldwide. The platform curates content from 1,300+ trusted tech sources and delivers personalized developer news, tutorials, and discussions. Available as browser extensions (Chrome, Edge), Progressive Web App (PWA), and mobile apps (iOS, Android).

Key capabilities:
- Personalized feeds filtered by tech interests and stack
- Squads: Developer communities focused on specific technologies
- Engagement: Upvote, comment, bookmark, and discuss content
- DevCard: Shareable developer profile cards
- Works offline with PWA support

## Core Features

- [Feed](/): Personalized developer content feed with multiple views (Popular, Most Upvoted, Best Discussions)
- [Squads](/squads/discover): Developer communities organized by topics (Languages, Web, Mobile, DevOps, AI, Career, Open Source)
- [Sources](/sources): 1,300+ curated content sources including blogs, publications, and YouTube channels
- [Tags](/tags): Topic-based content discovery and filtering
- [Posts](/posts): Tech articles, videos, and community discussions
- [Search](/search): Search across all content and discussions

## Products

### daily.dev Plus (Premium)
- [Plus](/plus): Premium subscription with AI-powered features
  - Smart Prompts: Run AI prompts on any post
  - Presidential Briefing: AI-powered personalized daily digest
  - Clickbait Shield: AI rewrites misleading headlines
  - Ad-free experience
  - Advanced custom feeds and bookmark folders

### Hiring Platform
- [Jobs](/jobs): Developer job matching with warm introductions
- [Recruiter](https://recruiter.daily.dev): Developer-first hiring platform
  - Access to 1M+ engineers from 13K+ companies across 150+ countries
  - Smart matching based on developer interests and activity
  - Trusted by NVIDIA, Apple, Google, OpenAI, Stripe, Shopify, and more

### Developer Tools
- [DevCard](/settings/customization/devcard): Generate shareable developer profile cards
- [Browser Extension](https://daily.dev/browser-extension): New tab replacement for Chrome and Edge

## Developer Resources

- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/dailydotdev/daily): Open source (AGPL-3.0)
- [Documentation](https://docs.daily.dev): Official product documentation
- [Changelog](https://changelog.daily.dev): Product updates and releases
- [Contributing Guide](https://github.com/dailydotdev/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md)

## Markdown Documentation

Markdown versions of key pages for AI agents:

- [Sources Directory](/sources.md): All content sources in markdown format
- [Tags Directory](/tags.md): All topic tags in markdown format
- [Squads Directory](/squads/discover.md): Public Squads in markdown format

## Sitemaps

- [Static Sitemap](/sitemap.txt): Core navigation pages
- Dynamic Sitemaps (from API):
  - [Posts](/api/sitemaps/posts): All published articles and discussions
  - [Sources](/api/sitemaps/sources): Content sources and publications
  - [Squads](/api/sitemaps/squads): Public developer communities
  - [Tags](/api/sitemaps/tags): Topic tag pages
  - [Users](/api/sitemaps/users): Developer profiles
